hero.title: Grow a Garden You Love
hero.description: Discover plants, track growth, and get smart care reminders — all in one place. Whether you're a first-time plant parent or a seasoned gardener, Aphylia helps your plants thrive.
hero.socialProof: Join thousands of happy plant parents

features.title: Everything your garden needs, in one app.
features.subtitle: From tracking watering schedules to identifying unknown species, Aphylia has you covered.

smartLibrary.title: Smart Plant Library
smartLibrary.description: Access a comprehensive database with detailed care info—sunlight needs, watering schedules, soil preferences, and toxicity warnings.

careReminders.title: Care Reminders
careReminders.description: Never forget to water, mist, or fertilize. Get personalized notifications based on each plant's unique needs.

collections.title: Collections & Bookmarks
collections.description: Organize plants by room, garden, or mood. Create custom collections and save your favorites for quick access.

plantId.title: Visual Plant ID
plantId.description: Snap a photo and let Aphylia identify your mystery plant. Get instant care recommendations.

journal.title: Garden Journal
journal.description: Track growth milestones, log repotting dates, add notes, and document your plant journey with photos.

pwa.title: Cross-Device Sync
pwa.description: Works beautifully on mobile and desktop. Your data syncs seamlessly across all your devices.

howItWorks.title: Your plant journey starts here.
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to happier, healthier plants.

step1.title: Discover Plants
step1.description: Browse our library of 10,000+ species or scan any plant to identify it instantly and learn how to care for it.

step2.title: Build Your Garden
step2.description: Create personal gardens, add your plants, and organize your collection by room, type, or however you like.

step3.title: Watch Them Thrive
step3.description: Get smart reminders tailored to each plant, track growth over time, and never miss a watering again.

showcase.title: Designed for your shelf, balcony, or jungle.
showcase.subtitle: Whether you have one succulent or a hundred tropicals, Aphylia adapts to your style.
showcase.publicGardenDescription: Create beautiful public gardens, showcase your plants, and inspire other gardeners in the community.
